Text: How do I manage to burn this on a dvd since its way over 4,48 gb. My Nero burning room does not take it. Please help me. Great torrent BTW.
The disc format is DVD9, so you will have to burn this one on a double-layer DVD. If you don't have that then you will have to recode this to DVD5 yourself.
Dual layer DVD will be bought asap. Many thanx for seed and "away1" technical advice :-)

As Robbie is 1 of the wifes favorites & Mine I will seed as long as Poss. Thanks for the seeders hope it worth the wait :)
Thanks to the End result Im sure.
Cheers from NZ.
